      • getStorageObject

        public <T extends com.emc.storageos.storagedriver.model.StorageObject> T getStorageObject(java.lang.String storageSystemId,
                                                                                 java.lang.String objectId,
                                                                                 java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Get storage object with a given type with specified native ID which belongs to specified storage system
        Specified by:
        getStorageObject in interface com.emc.storageos.storagedriver.StorageDriver
        Parameters:
        storageSystemId - storage system native id
        objectId - object native id
        type - class instance
        Returns:
        storage object or null if does not exist

        Example of usage: StorageVolume volume = StorageDriver.getStorageObject("vmax-12345", "volume-1234", StorageVolume.class);

        Parameters:

        attrName - use string constants in the scaleioConstants.java. e.g. ScaleIOConstants.IP_ADDRESS
